Intellij Idea Shortcuts

11 Jan 2015 These are some of my most used keyboard short cuts Syntax aware selection in the editor selects a word at the caret and then selects expanding areas of the source code. For example, it may select a method name, then the expression that calls this method, then the whole statement,...
